title: The new user interface is not ergonomic
body:
The login s text is a little bit too small and hard to see the text u enter

the play button the old one is a lot convenience and it s kinda league of legend signature to me and the designer makes all the button too small and hard to see, also the colour as well, they are not colorful then old one,, looks like a dota 2 interface to me which i hated most, looks like lack of energy! 

Over roll the old interface is a lot better, the only thing is the login screen the animation screen is wider which is good

the real problem for the old interface is the shop,,,so inconvience to click and also makes u run back and forward when u try to purchase runes and stuff

replies.body:
press ctrl and +

this is more simple compared to the clunky legacy client.

Also please read the devblog release: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/client-update/article/3a587e99-6c9b-437a-a03b-7a7ac2be4bf8
